title: And They Shall Know No Fear
body: Ignore certain modifiers to APL loss; reroll a single defense die in specific cases.

title: Intercession Sergeant
body: M6" WS3+ BS3+ A4 W15 Sv3+. Weapons: bolt rifle or chainsword.

title: Intercession Gunner
body: M6" WS3+ BS3+ A3 W14 Sv3+. Bolt rifle (4/5, L5+).

title: Shock and Awe
body: Score at the end of the Turning Point if you control objectives after eliminating enemy nearby.

title: Oath of the Moment (Strategic)
body: Choose a target; gain rerolls against it this Turning Point.

title: Astartes Amulet
body: One operative only; improve defense in specific situations.
